title: Dan Hanzus on Tom Brady's decision to leave the Pats, 2020 AFC East Outlook and the Jets (Football 3/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Dan Hanzus of NFL Media to discuss normalcy and the lack thereof in the the NFL (5:00), Tom Brady's departure from the Patriots (9:00), the outlook for the AFC East in 2020 (27:30) and Dan's beloved Jets (34:30). Is TB12 actually washed? Is it a certainty the Bills will win the division this year? Can you get mono twice? This Friday Pick Six attempts to answer those questions and more.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @DanHanzus
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: It's been over a week since Tom Brady became a Buc and it's still hard to comprehend. Will Brinson and Dan Hanzus attempt to provide some clarity to the move.

Is TB12 actually washed? Is it a certainty the Bills will win the division this year? Can you get mono twice? This Friday Pick Six attempts to answer those questions and more.
